document_title: Ovarian functional cysts: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_name: nang-co-nang-buong-trung.json_4_Can I conceive with functional ovarian cysts?
subsection_content:
Functional cysts usually appear on either side of the ovary, rarely appear on both sides. Most cases of right ovarian functional cysts or left ovarian functional cysts are benign and do not affect women's health or reproductive function.
Dr. Kim Ngan said that in cases of functional cysts on both ovaries, surgery to remove the tumor and leave healthy ovaries, women are still able to conceive but the pregnancy rate is lower than normal. with normal.
In cases where functional cysts are cystic and have no healthy ovaries, it is necessary to remove both ovaries, which will cause women to lose the ability to conceive. However, now with the advancement of modern medicine as well as the support of state-of-the-art equipment, the extensive experience of fertility specialists can help women still have the ability to Pregnancy through in vitro fertilization.
